By emphasizing the importance of separation, I create a sense of urgency, a sense of us-versus-them, that galvanizes my followers and strengthens their resolve. I remind them that we are not just individuals, but a collective, a body of believers united in our quest for righteousness. And I assure them that as long as we remain separate, as long as we maintain our purity and our distinctiveness, we will be protected, we will be blessed, and we will ultimately triumph over the forces of darkness that seek to destroy us.
